## SLOs for Week 03

Students will be able to:

1.  Insert new records using the INSERT statement.
2.  Modify existing records using the UPDATE statement.
3.  Delete records using the DELETE statement.
4.  Manage transactions using COMMIT and ROLLBACK.
5.  Differentiate between materialized and non-materialized views.
6.  Create and manage indexes to optimize query performance.
